relation: Police are always out here so you'll be pretty safe
AWFUL! Greeks out here are so cliquey and rude.
Completely not worth what I'm paying. Way too expensive.
There's really not much to do for fun except make friends.
Wayne hall is edible, but completely disgusting. Gives you really bad stomachaches too.
They will have like a few activities at the beginning of each semester but other than that you'll be in your room all day watching tv.
Make sure that if you do decide to dorm you have a car. There is literally nothing to do here.
I would rate William Paterson a 3. It's really not for students who want to dorm because there is nothing to do out here. Better for commuting students.
pageTitle: William Paterson University of New Jersey Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {122013=The dorms are kind of old and there's always some kind of problem- including fire alarms at 3:00 AM., 283644=© 2015, Cappex.com, LLC, 91448=Every Tuesday and Thursday from 12:30-2:00 pm we have something called common hour. During common hour nobody has classes. Usually various clubs are holding functions with free food and music. Also you can join various clubs and learn and attend all the events they hold. All the sports at Willy P are competitive division III athletics. There are plenty of fun things to do on campus you just have to look for it., 41333=it exists; however, i don't know much about it yet. i have just received an email to join them by the end of february, so i will know more afterwards., 225583=Our usual traditions are every Tuesday and Thursday called common hour. This is a time where all students don't have class from 12:15-1:45 and the university sets up activities so all the students can come and enjoy and even son outsiders as well. All are welcomed!}

textAfterTable: Great for these types of students It's a college for every types of students. No matter what you major in, you will defiantly enjoy it. Tips for prospective students First of all, welcome to William Paterson University. If you have any problems with anything, just go to the college website and search for the phone numbers of that certain field and call them, they will solve your problems as soon as possible. Also, join clubs. Bang for the buck I'm really satisfied with the fees. I get financial aid and it covered everything, from tuition fees to books. Am enjoying being here I'm really glad I came here. Every people here are very helpful and friendly. They make it easier for first year students, such as myself to accustom with the college environment. Really enjoying it very much. Am learning a lot My first semester here and I already know more things than my older sister who is a junior in a different college. I amaze my family by giving them advise on subjects that they never thought I would know. Login to rate
